data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Waichert, Cecilia, Fernandez, Fernando, Castro-Huertas, Valentina, Juanita Rodriguez,, Pitts, James P. (2017): More new records of spider wasps from Colombia (Hymenoptera, Pompilidae). ZooKeys 658: 89-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.658.10538, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.658.10538
